cards.blackjack

Interface Blackjack.Rule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Blackjack.Rule.AllPlayerBlackjackRule, Blackjack.Rule.BlackjackPushRule, Blackjack.Rule.BlackjackWinRule, Blackjack.Rule.BustRule, Blackjack.Rule.DealerBustRule, Blackjack.Rule.EqualToDealerRule, Blackjack.Rule.GreaterThanDealerRule, Blackjack.Rule.NonBlackjack21PushRule, Blackjack.Rule.NonBlackjack21WinRule
    Enclosing class:
    Blackjack

    static interface Blackjack.Rule
    Interface for all rules for deciding the outcome of the game.

    Contains default implementations of all the rules exposed as instance variables. This allows implementation rules inherit from other rules if needed to reuse code. Also, keeps the rules encapsulated at one place. For a description of the rules

    See Also:
    http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Blackjack

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Blackjack.Rule.AllPlayerBlackjackRule
      Default implementation Rule identifying all players without dealer with Blackjack.
      static class  Blackjack.Rule.BlackjackPushRule
      Default implementation Rule identifying multiple players with Blackjack for a 'Push'.
      static class  Blackjack.Rule.BlackjackWinRule
      Default implementation Rule identifying player (including dealer) with a Blackjack 'Win'.
      static class  Blackjack.Rule.BustRule
      Default implementation Rule for player 'Bust'.
      static class  Blackjack.Rule.DealerBustRule
      Default implementation Rule for Dealer 'Bust'
      static class  Blackjack.Rule.EqualToDealerRule
      Default implementation Rule identifying all players with hand equal to the dealer for a 'Push.
      static class  Blackjack.Rule.GreaterThanDealerRule
      Default implementation Rule identifying all players with hand greater than the dealer for a 'Win'.
      static class  Blackjack.Rule.NonBlackjack21PushRule
      Default implementation Rule identifying all players with a Non-Blackjack 21 for a 'Push'.
      static class  Blackjack.Rule.NonBlackjack21WinRule
      Default implementation Rule identifying player with a Non-Blackjack 21 'Win'.

    • Method Detail

      • match

        boolean match(Blackjack game)
        Parameters:
        game - the current game instance
        Returns:
        whether the current rule applies

      • apply

        Blackjack.GameState apply(Blackjack game)
        Applies this rule. This call should be preceded by a call to match(Blackjack)
        Parameters:
        game - the current game instance
        Returns:
        the state of the game after applying the rule
